nodes.text: Ques was a planet in the Ques system in Hutt Space. It was a motley spaceport planet at the edge of Hutt Space, typically used by ships heading for the Si'Klaata Cluster. Outlanders landing at Ques were interrogated extensively.
Ques was located in a system between Sriluur and the Si'Klaata Cluster, along the Ac'fren Spur of the Sisar Run. It was the connecting point for ships traveling from Varl toward the Sisar Run.
